name: Witch (itch) (Katelyst)
description:
A 3D-platforming game about witches

The game is set in a 2000's urban jungle, where a modern-day witch in training keeps an eye out for its inhabitants. While overcoming obstacles and solving ridiculous problems, Leigh looks for more knowledge and practice in the craft and learns lessons about how to apply it for the greater good.

This is the first prototype of Witch, a work-in-progress game by Katelyst.

We aim to develop games with players, please leave any comments, ideas, or feedback in the comment section.
